name: bbmp-launcher
description: Nuxt + Electron launcher for BlueBerry Minecraft Proxy (BBMP)

scripts.dev: cross-env NUXT_DEV=1 concurrently -k -n NUXT,ELECTRON -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "nuxt dev" "wait-on tcp:3000 && electron ."
scripts.build: nuxt build && node scripts/postbuild.mjs && electron-builder -c electron-builder.yml
